text: mama dan nannanthara wela.
thawath sinamakaruwek wanne atik rahimi ya.
me siduwimath athi wenawa.
mehekariya kama aspas karala, pingan koppa hodala dala, polawa athuganawa.
poduwe sha්ri lankiya samajayath, wisheshayen wipakshayath, therimak kala yuthuwa thibe: nagi sitima ho yatath wima.
kalliya thama thama mithurange pita kasanawa athi..

thawada mema mangala sewaye liyapadinchi wi athi apekshakayinge wiwahaka, awiwahakabawa, rakiyawa, aadayama athulu wisthara wala sathya asathya bhawaya soya balimata apa aayathanaya kisidu andame wagakimakata bandi nomatha.
mama sinamawata aawe siriparakum chithrapatayen.
kira pamina ohu asalin wadi gaththa ya.

mema thinduwa prakasha karamin kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath lanka jayarathna menawiya sandahan sandahan kara sitiye nisi nithimaya patipatiya anugamanaya karamin withthikaruwanta erehiwa nawatha naduwak gonu kirimata allas komisamata nithimaya ida hasara wiwruthawa athi bawa abhiyachanadhikarana niyogaye sandahan kara athi bawayi.

pa්radhana washayenma katahanda wenaswima (ugura barandiwima), ugure yamak sirawi athi bawa danima, ugura aasadanaya wima nisa athiwana semgedi, kshanikawa katahanda pitanowima, ugure yamak sirawima aadiya.

rata mada madhyama kandukaraye samanala gira asalin pana nagi kolambaa nagaraya aashrithawa muhudata ekwana kalani nadiye supirisidu diya daharin poshanaya wana kagalu disthrikkayata ayath ruwanwalla yatiyanthota kithulgala dehioowita daraniyagala aadi pradesha ayath wana thun koralaya pradeshayayi.

enam, paradrushya bhawaya saha wagawima sahitha yahapalanayen yuktha, nasthiya nathi, (gnyathi sanga්rahaya saha gajamithuruwadaya athulu) dushanaya nathi, raja magul saha sobana wiyadam nathi, nithiye aadhipathyaya athi, karyakshama saha swadhina rajya aayathanawalin samanwitha, thorathuru dana ganime ayithiya sahitha, aayojana saha wyapara katayuthu sandaha sarala regulasi saha ka්riyaparipatiwalin yuth, yahapath wyaparika parisarayaki.
loka sahithya gana da ohuge parichaya mana ya.

adhipathi palaka panthiya wisin patawa thibena jathiwadi, deshape්rami patu drushtiwadaya kada bindahelimata dakune samajaya asamath wana thak, dakune pidithayage sahaya thama aragala sandaha nolabena thak uthure pidithayata siya ayithin wenuwen aragala kirimata nohaki wananeya.

kalapaye aarakshaka thathwaya wimarshanaya karana thawath indiyanu niladhariyeku pawasuye hath warak thama dhura kalaya thuladi chinaye sancharaya kala rajapaksha mahatha yatathe, shri lankawa thula chinaye kriyakarithwaya saha athi wishala aayojana siduwana aakaraya pilibadawa nawadilliya itha awadhanayen pasuwu bawayi.

dwiparshawika ayawaya giwisumakata elambaima prathikshepa kara, desambar aga hariye fedaral aanduwa parshawiya lesa wasa damimata bala karamin trathamp wisin awuluwana lada, dhawala manndiraya ha kongrasaye dimokratikayan athara masa thunak pamana thisse siduwemin athi gatuma thula, tramp katayuthu karamin sitinne, amarikanu dhanapathi deshapalanaye samanya nithiyata pitu pamini.

in pasu, rajab, 2011 nowambar masayedi, baharenaya thula manawa ayithiwasikam walata erehiwa kriyathmaka wana prachanda kriya pilibanda, nirdesha kirim 11 k sahitha, pitu 27 kin yuth warthawak muda hariyeya.

pasalata krida pitiyak nomathi nisa pasalin baharawa madak durin pihiti krida pittaniye puhunuwim katayuthu sidu karana nisa shriyani guruthumiya thama sathu motar rathaya ragena with thibune ema katayuthuwalata yamata pahasu nisa ya.thamage pasale anekuth guruwariyan da thama motar rathaye ragena pittaniyata yama ha eema da aya sidukara atha.pereda (07) dina pawathwimata niyamithawa thibu krida uthsawaye awasan puhunuwim sidukaramin thibu athara eya awasanwa mema guruwariya niwasata yame di me anathurata lakwa thibe.siddhiya pilibanda gampola polisiya magin sidukala parikshana magin heli wi aththe bawumak sahitha mema margaye anathurata lak wu motar rathaya mitar 100 pamana udin gos adi 101 pahathin athi oyata wisiwi athi bawayi.mema anathurin motar rathayata barapathala hani sidu wi thibu athara siddhiya wana awasthawe doluwa niwase siti agamathiwaraya da ema sthanayata pamina katayuthu soya balanu labiya.gampola polis sthanadhipathi chandra jayawira mahathage upades matha ratha wahana anshaye niladharinge meheyawima matha marana parikshana katayuthu peradeniya rohale di hadisi marana parikshaka udangamuwa mahatha wisin pawathwana ladi..

danata 100 %k indhana walin kriyathmaka wana prawahana kshethraya, 2020 wanawita widuliyen kriyathmaka kirime saha ema widuliya haritha widuliyen nipadawa ganime aramuna peradari karaganimin, widuli motar ratha sandaha wana prathama widuli aaropana madhyasthanaya , kolambaa, tikal mawathe pihiti anka 10 darana sthanayedi, widulibala ha balashakthi amathya patali champika ranawaka mahatha athin ada wiwrutha wiya.
un okkogema aagama eka unath awith thiyenne wiwidha sanskruthin walin nisa hasirimath wiwidhakarayi .
